<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Identity Providers"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/users/me/providers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a list of connected identity providers for the current user.

Users can connect multiple OAuth2 providers to their account.
You can learn more about this [here](../../docs/guides/auth/oauth2).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token) is required.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The list of identity providers.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"provider":{"type":"string"}},"required":["provider"],"title":"IdentityProviderResponse"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Invalid `AccessToken`.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
